QuestionText: Which of the following best describes inclusive education?
OptionA: Education for all students regardless of their abilities
OptionB: Education focusing only on high achievers
OptionC: Education arranged exclusively for differently-abled students
CorrectAnswer: Education for all students regardless of their abilities
